stage1.example: 这些孩子非常需要爱心和关心。(zhè xiē hái zi fēi cháng xū yào ài xīn hé guān xīn) - These children really need love and attention.
他告诉我明天的活动安排。(tā gào sù wǒ míng tiān de huó dòng ān pái) - He told me about tomorrow's activity arrangements.
教室里又安装了几盏灯。(jiào shì lǐ yòu ān zhuāng le jǐ zhǎn dēng) - Several more lamps were installed in the classroom.
按学校的计划，明天明天考试。(àn xué xiào de jì huà, míng tiān míng tiān kǎo shì) - According to the school's plan, there will be an exam tomorrow.
我们要按照规定去做。(wǒ men yào àn zhào guī dìng qù zuò) - We must act according to the regulations.

stage1.definition: Particle used before a direct object, to take, to hold
stage1.example: 我把书放在桌上。(wǒ bǎ shū fàng zài zhuō shàng) - I put the book on the desk.
他手里拿着一把雨伞。(tā shǒu lǐ ná zhe yī bǎ yǔ sǎn) - He's holding an umbrella in his hand.

stage1.definition: To grasp, to seize, to master
stage1.example: 你要把握这个机会。(nǐ yào bǎ wò zhè gè jī huì) - You should grasp this opportunity.
今天已经卖了百个。(jīn tiān yǐ jīng mài le bǎi gè) - Today we've already sold a hundred.
这块地空着真可惜，种上一些白菜吧。(zhè kuài dì kōng zhe zhēn kě xī, zhǒng shàng yī xiē bái cài ba) - It's a shame this plot is empty, plant some cabbage.

stage2.example: 新学期，班级人数有些变动。(xīn xué qī, bān jí rén shù yǒu xiē biàn dòng) - In the new semester, there are some changes in class size.

stage2.definition: To move, to shift, to relocate
stage2.example: 这个东西我搬不动。(zhè gè dōng xī wǒ bān bù dòng) - I can't move this thing.
我搬家那天，有很多邻居来帮忙。(wǒ bān jiā nà tiān, yǒu hěn duō lín jū lái bāng máng) - On the day I moved, many neighbors came to help.
可带用铁锤把木板切割开了。(kě dài yòng tiě chuí bǎ mù bǎn qiē gē kāi le) - He used an iron hammer to cut the wooden board apart.

stage2.definition: To handle, to process, to deal with
stage2.example: 我的出国手续已经办理好了。(wǒ de chū guó shǒu xù yǐ jīng bàn lǐ hǎo le) - My procedures for going abroad have already been handled.

stage2.definition: To protect, to defend, to guarantee
stage2.example: 他们修路是为保安全。(tā men xiū lù shì wèi bǎo ān quán) - They are repairing the road to ensure safety.
他被保安拦在门外。(tā bèi bǎo ān lán zài mén wài) - He was blocked outside by security.

stage2.definition: To maintain, to keep, to preserve
stage2.example: 阅读室里大家应该保持安静。(yuè dú shì lǐ dà jiā yīng gāi bǎo chí ān jìng) - Everyone should maintain silence in the reading room.

stage2.definition: To preserve, to conserve, to save
stage2.example: 妈妈还保存着我小时候穿过的衣服。(mā ma hái bǎo cún zhe wǒ xiǎo shí hòu chuān guò de yī fú) - Mom still keeps the clothes I wore when I was little.

stage2.definition: To protect, to defend, to safeguard
stage2.example: 我们要保护好自己的眼睛。(wǒ men yào bǎo hù hǎo zì jǐ de yǎn jīng) - We should protect our eyes well.

stage3.definition: To keep, to maintain, to preserve
stage3.example: 我保留着她全部的信。(wǒ bǎo liú zhe tā quán bù de xìn) - I keep all her letters.
反正出了事可以找保险赔偿。(fǎn zhèng chū le shì kě yǐ zhǎo bǎo xiǎn péi cháng) - Anyway, if something happens, you can seek compensation from insurance.

stage3.definition: To guarantee, to ensure, to pledge
stage3.example: 这件事我保证能做好。(zhè jiàn shì wǒ bǎo zhèng néng zuò hǎo) - I guarantee that I can do this well.
今天晚报有什么内容？(jīn tiān wǎn bào yǒu shén me nèi róng) - What's in today's evening newspaper?

stage3.definition: To report for duty, to check in
stage3.example: 新学生今天开始报到。(xīn xué shēng jīn tiān kāi shǐ bào dào) - New students begin to register today.

stage3.definition: To report, to cover news, news story
stage3.example: 他写了一篇生动的报道。(tā xiě le yī piān shēng dòng de bào dào) - He wrote a vivid news report.
你应该把事情的经过向领导报告。(nǐ yīng gāi bǎ shì qíng de jīng guò xiàng lǐng dǎo bào gào) - You should report the course of events to the leader.

stage3.definition: Back, to carry on one's back
stage3.example: 我背着书包去学校。(wǒ bēi zhe shū bāo qù xué xiào) - I carry my schoolbag to school.
中国的北部很冷。(zhōng guó de běi bù hěn lěng) - The northern part of China is very cold.
我的背很痛。(wǒ de bèi hěn tòng) - My back hurts.

stage4.example: 有话就当面讲，不要在背后说。(yǒu huà jiù dāng miàn jiǎng, bù yào zài bèi hòu shuō) - If you have something to say, say it to my face, don't talk behind my back.
蛋糕被妹妹吃了。(dàn gāo bèi mèi mei chī le) - The cake was eaten by my younger sister.
晚上记得盖好被子，别感冒了。(wǎn shang jì de gài hǎo bèi zi, bié gǎn mào le) - Remember to cover yourself with the quilt at night, don't catch a cold.

stage4.definition: Originally, at first, it goes without saying
stage4.example: 这种小事本来就不该麻烦别人。(zhè zhǒng xiǎo shì běn lái jiù bù gāi má fan bié rén) - Such a small matter shouldn't bother others in the first place.
你可以相信他，他很有本领。(nǐ kě yǐ xiàng xìn tā, tā hěn yǒu běn lǐng) - You can trust him, he is very capable.
我认为他没个本事。(wǒ rèn wéi tā méi gè běn shì) - I think he has no skill.
这件事情比较复杂。(zhè jiàn shì qíng bǐ jiào fù zá) - This matter is relatively complicated.
我们班的男女比例是1:1。(wǒ men bān de nán nǚ bǐ lì shì 1:1) - The male-to-female ratio in our class is 1:1.
今晚有一场足球比赛。(jīn wǎn yǒu yī chǎng zú qiú bǐ sài) - There is a football match tonight.
那是这个决定的必然后果。(nà shì zhè gè jué dìng de bì rán hòu guǒ) - That is the inevitable consequence of this decision.

stage5.example: 她从来没有出去工作的必要。(tā cóng lái méi yǒu chū qù gōng zuò de bì yào) - She never had the need to go out to work.
家乡变化真大，我快认不出来了。(jiā xiāng biàn huà zhēn dà, wǒ kuài rèn bù chū lái le) - My hometown has changed so much, I almost can't recognize it.
你要努力学习，才能让梦想变为现实。(nǐ yào nǔ lì xué xí, cái néng ràng mèng xiǎng biàn wéi xiàn shí) - You need to study hard to make your dreams come true.
答卷看报纸都是先看标题，再看内容。(dá juàn kàn bào zhǐ dōu shì xiān kàn biāo tí, zài kàn nèi róng) - When reading newspapers, one first looks at the headlines and then the content.
他普通话说得很标准。(tā pǔ tōng huà shuō de hěn biāo zhǔn) - His Mandarin pronunciation is very standard.
这首诗表达了他对家人的思念。(zhè shǒu shī biǎo dá le tā duì jiā rén de sī niàn) - This poem expresses his longing for his family.
他给我们每人一张填写的表格。(tā gěi wǒ men měi rén yī zhāng tián xiě de biǎo gé) - He gave each of us a form to fill out.
你不能只看事情的表面。(nǐ bù néng zhǐ kàn shì qíng de biǎo miàn) - You can't just look at the surface of matters.

stage5.definition: To indicate, to show, to demonstrate
stage5.example: 他们的行动表明他是一个可靠的人。(tā men de xíng dòng biǎo míng tā shì yī gè kě kào de rén) - Their actions show that he is a reliable person.
他工作中的表现很好。(tā gōng zuò zhōng de biǎo xiàn hěn hǎo) - His performance at work is very good.

stage6.example: 这本书内容好，并且写得很生动。(zhè běn shū nèi róng hǎo, bìng qiě xiě de hěn shēng dòng) - The content of this book is good, and it's written very vividly.

stage6.definition: To broadcast, to air, to transmit
stage6.example: 消息一播出，马上就传遍了全世界。(xiāo xī yī bō chū, mǎ shàng jiù chuán biàn le quán shì jiè) - As soon as the news was broadcast, it immediately spread throughout the world.

stage6.definition: To broadcast, to play, to air
stage6.example: 电视台播放比赛实况。(diàn shì tái bō fàng bǐ sài shí kuàng) - The TV station is broadcasting the live match.
不必去得太早。(bù bì qù de tài zǎo) - There's no need to go too early.
只有我们不断进步，才能不断进步。(zhǐ yǒu wǒ men bù duàn jìn bù, cái néng bù duàn jìn bù) - Only by continuously making progress can we keep advancing.

stage6.definition: No matter what, regardless of, whether... or...
stage6.example: 不论老师提出什么问题，他总能答上。(bù lùn lǎo shī tí chū shén me wèn tí, tā zǒng néng dá shàng) - No matter what question the teacher raises, he can always answer it.

stage6.definition: To repair, to patch, to mend, to make up for
stage6.example: 他答应给我补习数学。(tā dā ying gěi wǒ bǔ xí shù xué) - He agreed to tutor me in mathematics.

stage6.definition: To replenish, to supplement, to complement
stage6.example: 我想补充说明一下。(wǒ xiǎng bǔ chōng shuō míng yī xià) - I'd like to add some supplementary explanation.
听了这消息我心里很不安。(tīng le zhè xiāo xī wǒ xīn lǐ hěn bù ān) - After hearing this news, I felt very uneasy.

stage6.definition: Have no choice but to, cannot but, must
stage6.example: 他们不得不为了安全考虑。(tā men bù dé bù wèi le ān quán kǎo lǜ) - They had no choice but to consider safety.

stage7.example: 他不光不是我的老师，还是我的朋友。(tā bù guāng bú shì wǒ de lǎo shī, hái shì wǒ de péng yǒu) - He is not only my teacher, but also my friend.

stage7.definition: Not only, not just, not merely
stage7.example: 他不仅聪明，而且很漂亮。(tā bù jǐn cōng míng, ér qiě hěn piào liang) - He is not only intelligent but also very good-looking.
我买了一块布。(wǒ mǎi le yī kuài bù) - I bought a piece of cloth.
自信是走向成功的第一步。(zì xìn shì zǒu xiàng chéng gōng de dì yī bù) - Confidence is the first step towards success.
我看过这部电视剧。(wǒ kàn guò zhè bù diàn shì jù) - I have watched this TV series.
此事你必须向管理部门汇报。(cǐ shì nǐ bì xū xiàng guǎn lǐ bù mén huì bào) - You must report this matter to the management department.
王部长走进了会议室。(wáng bù zhǎng zǒu jìn le huì yì shì) - Minister Wang entered the conference room.
她是一个非常有才能的人。(tā shì yī gè fēi cháng yǒu cái néng de rén) - She is a person with great talent.

stage7.definition: To adopt, to take, to choose
stage7.example: 我们必须采取行动。(wǒ men bì xū cǎi qǔ xíng dòng) - We must take action.

stage7.definition: To adopt, to employ, to use
stage7.example: 公司采用了新的技术。(gōng sī cǎi yòng le xīn de jì shù) - The company has adopted new technology.

stage8.example: 我们有几册彩色的连环画册。(wǒ men yǒu jǐ cè cǎi sè de lián huán huà cè) - We have several colorful comic books.
这个地方我们曾经来玩过。(zhè gè dì fāng wǒ men céng jīng lái wán guò) - We have been to this place before.

stage8.definition: To produce, to generate, to create
stage8.example: 同学之间容易产生矛盾。(tóng xué zhī jiān róng yì chǎn shēng máo dùn) - It's easy for conflicts to arise among classmates.
我登上长城，环视周围的景色。(wǒ dēng shàng cháng chéng, huán shì zhōu wéi de jǐng sè) - I climbed the Great Wall and looked around at the scenery.
我们要学习别人的长处。(wǒ men yào xué xí bié rén de cháng chù) - We should learn from others' strengths.
他因长期患病身体很弱。(tā yīn cháng qī huàn bìng shēn tǐ hěn ruò) - He is weak due to long-term illness.
这台机器是我们厂生产的。(zhè tái jī qì shì wǒ men chǎng shēng chǎn de) - This machine is produced by our factory.
在公共场合，要注意文明礼貌。(zài gōng gòng chǎng hé, yào zhù yì wén míng lǐ mào) - In public places, one should pay attention to civilized manners.
图书室是大家读书的场所。(tú shū shì shì dà jiā dú shū de chǎng suǒ) - The library is a place for everyone to read.
这一房子超级的大。(zhè yī fáng zi chāo jí de dà) - This house is super big.

stage9.example: 这个房间太阳照不到到，所以有点潮。(zhè ge fáng jiān tài yáng zhào bù dào dào, suǒ yǐ yǒu diǎn cháo) - This room doesn't get sunlight, so it's a bit damp.

stage9.definition: Noisy, to quarrel, to make a noise
stage9.example: 那边发生什么事了？好吵啊！(nà biān fā shēng shén me shì le? hǎo chǎo a!) - What's happening over there? So noisy!

stage9.definition: To quarrel, to argue, to bicker
stage9.example: 前几天我和朋友吵了架。(qián jǐ tiān wǒ hé péng you chǎo le jià) - I had a quarrel with my friend a few days ago.
现在大家更注重衣食的成本。(xiàn zài dà jiā gèng zhù zhòng yī shí de chéng běn) - Now everyone pays more attention to the cost of clothing and food.
老师被称为森林的大王。(lǎo shī bèi chēng wéi sēn lín de dà wáng) - The teacher is called the king of the forest.
大会取得圆满成功。(dà huì qǔ dé yuán mǎn chéng gōng) - The conference achieved complete success.
劳动成果是用汗水换来的。(láo dòng chéng guǒ shì yòng hàn shuǐ huàn lái de) - The fruits of labor are earned with sweat.
这不是什么大不了的成绩。(zhè bú shì shén me dà bù liǎo de chéng jì) - This is not such a big achievement.

stage9.definition: To establish, to set up, to found
stage9.example: 我们公司成立于2010年。(wǒ men gōng sī chéng lì yú 2010 nián) - Our company was established in 2010.
他看起来更加成熟了。(tā kàn qǐ lái gèng jiā chéng shú le) - He looks more mature now.

stage10.example: 组里的每个成员的想法都不同。(zǔ lǐ de měi gè chéng yuán de xiǎng fǎ dōu bù tóng) - Every member in the group has different ideas.
这是我学习和成长的地方。(zhè shì wǒ xué xí hé chéng zhǎng de dì fāng) - This is where I learn and grow.
他在城里工作中。(tā zài chéng lǐ gōng zuò zhōng) - He works in the city.
在重庆，北京等不少城市。(zài chóng qìng, běi jīng děng bù shǎo chéng shì) - In cities like Chongqing, Beijing, and many others.
人民的文化程度日益提高。(rén mín de wén huà chéng dù rì yì tí gāo) - The cultural level of the people is increasing day by day.

stage10.definition: To continue, to persist, to last
stage10.example: 这场大雨持续下了三天。(zhè chǎng dà yǔ chí xù xià le sān tiān) - The heavy rain continued for three days.

stage10.definition: To be full of, brimming with
stage10.example: 歌声里充满信心和力量。(gē shēng lǐ chōng mǎn xìn xīn hé lì liàng) - The singing is full of confidence and strength.
我重看了一遍这部电影。(wǒ chóng kàn le yī biàn zhè bù diàn yǐng) - I watched this movie again.
初夏就已经很热了。(chū xià jiù yǐ jīng hěn rè le) - It's already very hot in early summer.

stage10.definition: First day of the month, first year of junior high
stage10.example: 大年初一，朋友们互相问好。(dà nián chū yī, péng you men hù xiāng wèn hǎo) - On the first day of the Lunar New Year, friends greet each other.

stage11.example: 在会上，大家谈了初步的意见。(zài huì shàng, dà jiā tán le chū bù de yì jiàn) - At the meeting, everyone expressed preliminary opinions.

stage11.definition: To create, to bring about, to produce
stage11.example: 科学家创造了新的技术。(kē xué jiā chuàng zào le xīn de jì shù) - Scientists created new technology.
他用锤子把钉子敲进墙里。(tā yòng chuí zi bǎ dìng zi qiāo jìn qiáng lǐ) - He hammered the nail into the wall.

stage11.definition: To handle, to deal with, to process
stage11.example: 我们需要处理这个问题。(wǒ men xū yào chǔ lǐ zhè ge wèn tí) - We need to handle this problem.

stage11.definition: To go out, to leave home
stage11.example: 我每天早上七点出门。(wǒ měi tiān zǎo shàng qī diǎn chū mén) - I go out at 7 o'clock every morning.

stage12.definition: To attend, to participate, to be present
stage12.example: 总统将出席这次会议。(zǒng tǒng jiāng chū xí zhè cì huì yì) - The president will attend this meeting.

stage12.definition: To rent out, to hire out
stage12.example: 他把房子出租给了留学生。(tā bǎ fáng zi chū zū gěi le liú xué shēng) - He rented the house to foreign students.
这篇文章里有几处错误。(zhè piān wén zhāng lǐ yǒu jǐ chù cuò wù) - There are several errors in this article.

stage12.definition: To reach, to achieve, to attain
stage12.example: 我们终于达到了目标。(wǒ men zhōng yú dá dào le mù biāo) - We finally reached our goal.
他大概明天到。(tā dà gài míng tiān dào) - He will probably arrive tomorrow.

stage13.example: 这条道路通往村庄。(zhè tiáo dào lù tōng wǎng cūn zhuāng) - This road leads to the village.
我想向你道歉。(wǒ xiǎng xiàng nǐ dào qiàn) - I want to apologize to you.
我们在机场等待了两个小时。(wǒ men zài jī chǎng děng dài le liǎng gè xiǎo shí) - We waited at the airport for two hours.
我们去吃点心吧。(wǒ men qù chī diǎn xin ba) - Let's go eat some snacks.
周末我们去电影院看电影。(zhōu mò wǒ men qù diàn yǐng yuàn kàn diàn yǐng) - We go to the cinema to watch movies on weekends.

stage14.definition: To investigate, to survey, to research
stage14.example: 警察正在调查这起案件。(jǐng chá zhèng zài diào chá zhè qǐ àn jiàn) - The police are investigating this case.
地球是太阳系中的第三颗行星。(dì qiú shì tài yáng xì zhōng de dì sān kē xíng xīng) - Earth is the third planet in the solar system.
地下有很多矿物。(dì xià yǒu hěn duō kuàng wù) - There are many minerals underground.
请告诉我你的地址。(qǐng gào su wǒ nǐ de dì zhǐ) - Please tell me your address.
孩子们喜欢去动物园。(hái zi men xǐ huān qù dòng wù yuán) - Children like to go to the zoo.

stage15.example: 我给你发了一条短信。(wǒ gěi nǐ fā le yī tiáo duǎn xìn) - I sent you a text message.
这是一支很强的队伍。(zhè shì yī zhī hěn qiáng de duì wǔ) - This is a very strong team.
他们进行了一次重要的对话。(tā men jìn xíng le yī cì zhòng yào de duì huà) - They had an important dialogue.

stage15.definition: To correspond, to match, to correlate
stage15.example: 每个问题都有对应的答案。(měi gè wèn tí dōu yǒu duì yìng de dá àn) - Every question has a corresponding answer.
我们使用多媒体教学。(wǒ men shǐ yòng duō méi tǐ jiào xué) - We use multimedia teaching.

stage16.example: 这个公园是为儿童设计的。(zhè ge gōng yuán shì wèi ér tóng shè jì de) - This park is designed for children.
他会把这篇文章翻译成英文。(tā huì bǎ zhè piān wén zhāng fān yì chéng yīng wén) - He will translate this article into English.
学生们经常吃方便面。(xué shēng men jīng cháng chī fāng biàn miàn) - Students often eat instant noodles.
我们需要找到一种新的方式解决这个问题。(wǒ men xū yào zhǎo dào yī zhǒng xīn de fāng shì jiě jué zhè ge wèn tí) - We need to find a new way to solve this problem.

stage16.definition: To reflect, to report, to mirror, to respond
stage16.example: 这部电影反映了社会现实。(zhè bù diàn yǐng fǎn yìng le shè huì xiàn shí) - This film reflects social reality.

stage17.definition: To discover, to find, to detect
stage17.example: 科学家发现了一种新物质。(kē xué jiā fā xiàn le yī zhǒng xīn wù zhì) - Scientists discovered a new substance.

stage17.definition: To develop, to grow, development, growth
stage17.example: 中国经济正在快速发展。(zhōng guó jīng jì zhèng zài kuài sù fā zhǎn) - China's economy is developing rapidly.
这件事非常重要。(zhè jiàn shì fēi cháng zhòng yào) - This matter is very important.
工厂排放废气污染环境。(gōng chǎng pái fàng fèi qì wū rǎn huán jìng) - Factories emit exhaust gases that pollute the environment.
他在考试中得了很高的分数。(tā zài kǎo shì zhōng dé le hěn gāo de fēn shù) - He got a high score in the exam.

stage18.example: 服务员给我们端来了菜。(fú wù yuán gěi wǒ men duān lái le cài) - The waiter brought us the dishes.

stage18.definition: To change, to alter, to transform
stage18.example: 科技改变了我们的生活。(kē jì gǎi biàn le wǒ men de shēng huó) - Technology has changed our lives.

stage18.definition: Common cold, to catch a cold
stage18.example: 我昨天感冒了。(wǒ zuó tiān gǎn mào le) - I caught a cold yesterday.
他们之间的感情很深。(tā men zhī jiān de gǎn qíng hěn shēn) - The feelings between them are deep.

stage18.definition: To thank, to be grateful, to appreciate
stage18.example: 我想感谢你的帮助。(wǒ xiǎng gǎn xiè nǐ de bāng zhù) - I want to thank you for your help.

stage19.definition: To do, to make, to handle, to carry on
stage19.example: 他在搞什么？(tā zài gǎo shén me) - What is he doing?
这是一个根本性的问题。(zhè shì yī gè gēn běn xìng de wèn tí) - This is a fundamental problem.
这是我的个人意见。(zhè shì wǒ de gè rén yì jiàn) - This is my personal opinion.

stage19.definition: Various kinds, all sorts of, diverse, varied
stage19.example: 商店里有各式各样的商品。(shāng diàn lǐ yǒu gè shì gè yàng de shāng pǐn) - The store has various kinds of goods.
这是一个公园。(zhè shì yī gè gōng yuán) - This is a public park.

stage20.example: 他在工厂工作。(tā zài gōng chǎng gōng zuò) - He works in a factory.
这是修理用的工具。(zhè shì xiū lǐ yòng de gōng jù) - These are tools for repairs.
裁判必须公平。(cái pàn bì xū gōng píng) - The referee must be fair.
他来自工人阶级家庭。(tā lái zì gōng rén jiē jí jiā tíng) - He comes from a working-class family.
周末我们去公园散步。(zhōu mò wǒ men qù gōng yuán sàn bù) - We go to the park for a walk on weekends.
